StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: As you walk around the shallow swimming area, you notice lots of empty lounge chairs and a couples empty beach towels laying around. There's no trace of clouds in the sky and the sun is big and heavy, looking back at the chairs you begin to wonder where the hell are the women, it's such a nice day. You suddenly get a brilliant idea, why not fill those empty spots by your own. You focus your mind and come up with a spell that will do exactly that.
StaticSkill.Description: Ever wonder why women seems to enjoy sunbathing so much. Well you can find out on your own with this spell, turn any unaware targets into a blonde beach bombshell that just begs to show her well toned body to everyone... and the sun of course.
